::Drillbit::

"Ok, if I must."
Drillbit didn't like waiting for anyone, but he had to get in to the
Pred's.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod was carrying Scythe, when Arcangel's message came across.
"All Maximal's, I'm going to help Prowl, Dinobot, and Arcangel. I'll
need all the back up I can get, if you're coming, lets go now.
Beast mode." Hot Rod transformed to his bat mode, and took off in
Arcangel's direction. Once he's airborn, he opens his comlink, to all
Maximal's.
"All Maximal's, this is Hot Rod. Converge on Arcangel's position. We're
going to help rescue the captured bots."
